column3: enuanom krɔnkrɔn a hom fora sor frɛ no mu
column4: hom nhwɛ gyedzi a yegyina do ka asɛm no ho Somafo nye Sɔfopanyin Jesus a"

column2: "odzii nokwar maa nyia ɔdze no sii hɔ no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Moses so dzii wɔ ne fi nyina do."

column2: "Na ɔno na woebu no dɛ enyidzi pii fata no kyɛn Moses
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nyia osi dan no wɔ enyidzi sen dan no."

column2: "(Na dan biara obi na osi; na nyia osii adze nyina nye Nyankopɔn.)"

column3: odzii nokwar wɔ ne fie nyina do dɛ ɔsomfo
column4: ama ɔaayɛ nsɛm a wɔrebɛka no ekyir yi ho adasedzi."

column3: odzii ne fie do dɛ ɔba; na fie no nye hɛn
column4: ber a yesuo enyidado no ho ndam nye ahohyehyɛ no mu dzen ekesi ewiei no."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no se no
column5: sɛ hom tse ne ndze a

column4: Dɛ nsɔhwɛ da no mu wɔ sar no do hɔ
column6: "Mbrɛ hom egyanom gyegyee me sɔɔ me hwɛe
column9: "mfe araa eduanan. Dɛm ntsi mo bo fuuw dɛm mbasantsen no
column11: Wɔfom wɔ hɔn akoma mu daa: Na wonnhun m'ahyɛdze."

column3: mekaa ntam dɛ Wɔrennhɛn m'ahomgye mu."

column4: na ekyingye akoma bɔn bi aammba hom mu biara mu
column5: na ɔaannwaa emmfi Nyankopɔn tseasefo no ho:"

column2: "na mbom hom ntutu homho fo nkorkor daa nyina
column3: mber tsentsen a hom ka dɛ
column4: Ndɛ no; amma bɔn ndaadaa aannsorow hom mu biara."

column2: "Na sɛ yesuo hɛn enyidado a yenyaa no ahyɛse no mu pintsinn kodu ewiei a

column4: sɛ hom tse ne ndze a
column6: dɛ mber a woyii no ehi no mu."

column3: woyii ehi? Ana nnyɛ hɔn a wɔnam Moses do fii Egypt nyina no a?"

column2: "Na woananom ho na ɔyɛɛ no ehi mfe eduanan no? Ana nnyɛ hɔn a wɔyɛɛ bɔn ma hɔn efun dedaa sar do no a?"
"Na woananom na ɔkaa ntam dɛ wɔrennhɛn n'ahomgye mu no? Nnyɛ hɔn a wɔyɛɛ asokyew no?"
"Na yehu dɛ ekyingye ntsi na woenntum annhɛn n'ahomgye no mu no."
